# Quizzes {.unnumbered}

<div class="iframe-container">
  <iframe id="external-website" src="https://version-control-versioncontrol.formr.org" width="600" height="750"></iframe>
</div>
<div id="quiz-display"></div>
<button class="prev-iframe" onclick="prevIframe()">Previous Quiz</button>
<button class="next-iframe" onclick="nextIframe()">Next Quiz</button>
<button class="book-chapter" onclick="openBookChapter()">Book Chapter</button>
<button class="quiz-link" onclick="openQuizLink()">Quiz Link</button>

<script>
  var websites = [
    "https://version-control-versioncontrol.formr.org",
    "https://version-control-cli.formr.org",
    "https://version-control-basics.formr.org",
    "https://version-control-branches.formr.org",
    "https://version-control-github.formr.org"
  ];
  var bookChapters = [
    "https://lennartwittkuhn.com/version-control-book/chapters/intro-version-control.html",
    "https://lennartwittkuhn.com/version-control-book/chapters/command-line.html",
    "https://lennartwittkuhn.com/version-control-book/chapters/first-steps-git.html",
    "https://lennartwittkuhn.com/version-control-book/chapters/branches.html",
    "https://lennartwittkuhn.com/version-control-book/chapters/github-intro.html"
  ];
  var currentIndex = 0;
  var iframe = document.getElementById('external-website');
  var quizDisplay = document.getElementById('quiz-display');

  function updateQuizDisplay() {
    var quizNames = [
        "Intro to Version Control",
        "Command Line",
        "First Steps with Git",
        "Branches",
        "GitHub"
    ];

    quizDisplay.textContent = "Currently Displaying: " + quizNames[currentIndex];
  }

  function nextIframe() {
    currentIndex = (currentIndex + 1) % websites.length;
    iframe.src = websites[currentIndex];
    updateQuizDisplay();
  }

  function prevIframe() {
    currentIndex = (currentIndex - 1 + websites.length) % websites.length;
    iframe.src = websites[currentIndex];
    updateQuizDisplay();
  }

  function openBookChapter() {
    // Open the corresponding book chapter URL for the currently displayed quiz
    var bookChapterUrl = bookChapters[currentIndex];
    window.open(bookChapterUrl, "_blank");
  }

  function openQuizLink() {
    // Open the quiz link in a new tab
    window.open(websites[currentIndex], "_blank");
  }

  // Initial display
  updateQuizDisplay();
</script>

<style>
  .iframe-container {
    position: relative;
    width: 100%;
    height: 600px; /* Adjust height as needed */
    overflow: hidden;
  }
  .iframe-container iframe {
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    border: none;
  }
  #quiz-display {
    margin-top: 10px;
    font-weight: bold;
  }
.prev-iframe,
.next-iframe,
.book-chapter,
.quiz-link {
    position: absolute;
    bottom: 10px;
    padding: 5px 10px;
    background-color: #333;
    color: #fff;
    cursor: pointer;
    margin: 0 5px; /* Add space between buttons */
}

.prev-iframe {
    left: 10px;
}

.next-iframe {
    left: 140px; /* Adjust spacing as needed */
}

.book-chapter {
    right: 140px; /* Adjust spacing as needed */
}

.quiz-link {
    right: 10px;
}

</style>
